Cascoon (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0267: Beautifly
Pokémon
#0269: Dustox →

Cascoon has been featured on 8 different cards since it debuted in the EX Ruby & Sapphire expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Cascoon cards are normally Grass-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Cascoon

Cascoon
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Cascoon EX Ruby & Sapphire 26/109 ADV Expansion Pack 007/055
Cascoon EX Legend Maker 30/92 Mirage Forest 009/086
Cascoon Diamond & Pearl 44/130 Space-Time Creation  
Cascoon Platinum 44/127 Galactic's Conquest 004/096
Cascoon Dragons Exalted 9/124 Dragon Blast 006/050
Cascoon Roaring Skies 6/108 Emerald Break 006/078
Cascoon Lost Thunder 27/214 Thunderclap Spark 004/060
Cascoon Lost Origin 009/196 Dark Phantasma 007/071


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
